name: flap PY bird
description:
This is my submission to the Game Off 2022 game jam!

the theme was cliche, so I made a flappy bird clone in python. In the game you need to try to dodge errors from the programming language, which were hard to dodge even while coding the game ;-) 

It was made with the pyGame library, and it was a lot of fun! It was very interesting trying to learn a new language and building a game with no game engine. Even though I definitely could have put more work to it, I think the finished game is a lot of fun.

Jump with the left mouse button, spacebar or up-key
